name: Safari Kid Racing
description: Have you ever wanted to drive a Jeep in safari? This is the most simple and fun racing game for 2 - 10 years kids. You can control Lion, Elephant, Gnu or Zebra! Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Control your car with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and rolls on it's way. Other racing games get's boring for your kid because of hard levels or controls? This is what you were looking for!
